info.name: Vanilla Volafile style [Lainchan.org]
info.description:
A Vanilla Volafile themed userstyle for lainchan.org
Must use on default style Dark_red
info.additionalInfo:
1 | fixed .pages.top


Volafile.io design data

COLOURS:
---------------
L 	= 	Light
D 	= 	Dark
V 	= 	Vivid
BG 	= 	Background
ACC	= 	Accents
USR	= 	Used by text/usernames
min	= 	Minimal use
max	= 	Maximized use
----------------
HEX		RGB/A			TONE		VALUE		
#536F8C 	(83,111,140) 	BlueL		ACCmax
#395168 	(57,81,104) 	BlueD		BG/ACCmax
#D56EFF		(213,110,255)	MagentaV	LOGOmax
#CC9EDF		(204,158,223) 	MagentaL	LOGOmin
#FFFFFF		(255,255,255)	White		ACCmin/USR
#13C15F		(19,193,95) 	GreenV		USR
#32F486		(50,244,134) 	GreenVV		USR
#D880FC		(216,128,252) 	MagentaVL	USR
#435D78		(67,93,120) 	BlueD		ACC


#13b04a  for quotes and ease of reading
